mean_cn: adj. 本地的，本国的，与生俱来的；  n. 本地人，土著，当地动植物
mean_en: of or relating to a group of people who were living in an area (such as North America or Africa) when a new group of usually European people arrived
word_etyma: nat出生 + ive名词后缀 →native本地人
sentence: American Indians are the only people native to the USA.
sentence_trans: 印第安人是美国唯一的土著人。
